content.raw:
If this is  up today, then I think for SubT; this is a good starting point. Below is what they are asking for regarding migration documentation.

_Develop migration documentation for Gazebo9-to-Ignition_:

1. Migration of simulation models \(Addisu\)

    1. REF: [Living documentation](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/subt_private/wiki/Migration%20Guide)
    
2. Migration of plugins \("¡¡No contaban con mi astucia!!"\)

    1. REF: [This \(Your\) tutorial](https://ignitionrobotics.org/api/gazebo/2.10/migrationplugins.html)
    
3. Migration of sensors

    1. REF: still TBD
    

‌

If this is up today, then I think for SubT; this is a good starting point. Below is what they are asking for regarding migration documentation.

Develop migration documentation for Gazebo9-to-Ignition:

  1. Migration of simulation models (Addisu)

    1. REF: Living documentation

  2. Migration of plugins ("¡¡No contaban con mi astucia!!")

    1. REF: This (Your) tutorial

  3. Migration of sensors

    1. REF: still TBD
